name: Area finished - left clean and tidy
All relevant drawings and revision numbers checked and attached
Joists are installed at correct centres
Solid timber blockings are installed at correct centres
Correct fixings being used – joist hangers / nailon plates / nails / bolts / washers
Have the strapping been installed correctly & straight?
Has the stapping been installed plumb & in line?
Has the stapping been installed in right spacing?
Has the timber nogs been install on bottom, celeing height and top
Has all the service nogs been installed in right place?
Has a pre-line inspection been completed by ACC?
